name: VIC Nibbler
overview: Vic Nibbler is a game made in 2019 for the Commodore Vic 20 computer with a 3K RAM expansion. Vic Nibbler is a new game made in 2019 for the Commodore Vic 20 computer with a 3K RAM expansion. Vic Nibbler is a remake of the Rock-Ola arcade classic which shares many of the features of the original arcade game. Vic Nibbler is easy to play, but difficult to beat! • Clear each maze before time runs out • Do not let Nibbler bite itself • Vic Nibbler does not stop at corners • Vic Nibbler grows longer when it eats • Time decreases faster when nibbler does not eat • Bonus is time left at end of wave • Extra Nibbler awarded after 4 waves • Vic Nibbler will slow down a little when you lose a life
